alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:32PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Laramie County through 415 PM MDT... At 332 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whitaker, or 15 miles northwest of Cheyenne, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitaker, North Cheyenne, Federal and Ranchettes. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 16 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
